meanings.definition: The quality or state of being manipulative.
meanings.sent1: Her manipulativenesses were evident in the way she always got what she wanted.
meanings.sent2: His manipulativenesses made it hard for others to trust him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his manipulativenesses, he couldn't convince his cat to take a bath.
meanings.sent4: The web of her manipulativenesses ensnared those around her.
meanings.sent5: The manipulativenesses of the villain made him a memorable character in the story.

meanings.definition: The act or practice of manipulating others for personal gain.
meanings.sent1: She engaged in manipulativenesses to climb the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent2: The manipulativenesses of the con artist were finally exposed.
meanings.sent3: His failed manipulativenesses left him empty-handed.
meanings.sent4: The world of politics is often filled with manipulativenesses.
meanings.sent5: The manipulativenesses of the salesman were transparent to all.
